about_the_game:
Welcome to Emilia’s Playroom VR!

In this playroom, you will have the opportunity to play with Emilia in a variety of ways in many different places.
After you visit the reception desk, you can enter a door of your choice.
There are more than 8 doors, and each door leads to a different place, transporting you to a new world.
Then, you can choose your favorite place to play.
Play can be viewed freely from various angles.
Instead of having unnatural changes in viewpoint like in 3D modeling tools,
the VR-FPS (first-person shooter) movement system allows you to feel fully immersed, as if you are right there.
You can freely view the play in various ways, as well as by adjusting your view height.
Once you have viewed a scene, you can easily watch it again later by using the scene select function.

You can choose from four different hair and costume colors.
There is also a function to make the male character transparent to make it easier to see the female body.

For those who want to take more time to enjoy the scene, there is also a time stop function.
You can pause and look around from any angle you want.

And there are plans to add more scenes through future free version upgrades!

content_descriptors.notes:
There is a sexual activity scene with consent.
All characters in this game are over 18 years old.

detailed_description:
Welcome to Emilia’s Playroom VR!

In this playroom, you will have the opportunity to play with Emilia in a variety of ways in many different places.
After you visit the reception desk, you can enter a door of your choice.
There are more than 8 doors, and each door leads to a different place, transporting you to a new world.
Then, you can choose your favorite place to play.
Play can be viewed freely from various angles.
Instead of having unnatural changes in viewpoint like in 3D modeling tools,
the VR-FPS (first-person shooter) movement system allows you to feel fully immersed, as if you are right there.
You can freely view the play in various ways, as well as by adjusting your view height.
Once you have viewed a scene, you can easily watch it again later by using the scene select function.

You can choose from four different hair and costume colors.
There is also a function to make the male character transparent to make it easier to see the female body.

For those who want to take more time to enjoy the scene, there is also a time stop function.
You can pause and look around from any angle you want.

And there are plans to add more scenes through future free version upgrades!

name: Emilia's PLAYROOM VR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForceGTX 1660super
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: MetaQuest2 with QuestLink(AirLink), OculusTouch , Valve Index , PICO4
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: win10
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForceRTX3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: MetaQuest2 with QuestLink (AirLink), OculusTouch , Valve Index　, PICO4

short_description: You can enjoy a variety of play with Emilia in a variety of locations. Play can be viewed from a variety of free angles. You can move your eyes up and down, For those who want to take their time, there is also a time stop function.
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
